info.label: Info
info.comment:
This module was developed by www.BelVG.com.
For docs & examples refer to the BelVG web site.
We have the largest selections of extensions and themes on Magento.

title_cloudzoom.label: Cloud-zoom
title_cloudzoom.tooltip: a free jQuery image zoom plugin

main_width.label: Main Width
main_width.tooltip:
in pixels

Width of main image at product view page

thumbs_width.label: Thumb Width
thumbs_width.tooltip:
in pixels

Width of thumbs at product view page

thumbs_height.label: Thumb Height
thumbs_height.tooltip:
in pixels

Height of thumbs at product view page

position_quickview.label: Position
position_quickview.tooltip:
Specifies the position of the zoom window relative to the small image.

Allowable values are 'left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom', 'inside' or you can specifiy the id of an html element to place the zoom window.

position_element_quickview.label: Position id of an html element
position_element_quickview.tooltip:
id of an html element to place the zoom window.

Example: element1
html: <div id="element1">

zoom_width_quickview.label: Zoom Width
zoom_width_quickview.tooltip:
in pixels. 0 - 'auto'

The width of the zoom window in pixels.

If 'auto' is specified, the width will be the same as the small image.

zoom_height_quickview.label: Zoom Height
zoom_height_quickview.tooltip:
in pixels. 0 - 'auto'

The height of the zoom window in pixels.

If 'auto' is specified, the height will be the same as the small image.

adjust_x_quickview.label: Adjust X
adjust_x_quickview.tooltip:
in pixels

Allows you to fine tune the x-position of the zoom window.

adjust_y_quickview.label: Adjust Y
adjust_y_quickview.tooltip:
in pixels

Allows you to fine tune the y-position of the zoom window.

position.label: Position
position.tooltip:
Specifies the position of the zoom window relative to the small image.

Allowable values are 'left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom', 'inside' or you can specifiy the id of an html element to place the zoom window.

position_element.label: Position id of an html element
position_element.tooltip:
id of an html element to place the zoom window.

Example: element1
html: <div id="element1">

zoom_width.label: Zoom Width
zoom_width.tooltip:
in pixels. 0 - 'auto'

The width of the zoom window in pixels.

If 'auto' is specified, the width will be the same as the small image.

zoom_height.label: Zoom Height
zoom_height.tooltip:
in pixels. 0 - 'auto'

The height of the zoom window in pixels.

If 'auto' is specified, the height will be the same as the small image.

adjust_x.label: Adjust X
adjust_x.tooltip:
in pixels

Allows you to fine tune the x-position of the zoom window in pixels.

adjust_y.label: Adjust Y
adjust_y.tooltip:
in pixels

Allows you to fine tune the y-position of the zoom window.

tint_show.label: Display Tint
tint_show.tooltip:
empty - disable

Specifies a tint color which will cover the small image.

effects with Blur Effect. are applied with some restrictions

tint.label: Tint Color
tint.tooltip:
Colors should be specified in hex format, e.g. '#aa00aa'.

effects with Blur Effect. are applied with some restrictions

tint_opacity.label: Tint Opacity
tint_opacity.tooltip:
Default value 0.5

Where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque.

soft_focus.label: Blur Effect
soft_focus.tooltip:
Applies a subtle blur effect to the small image. Set to true or false.

effects with Tint Effect. are applied with some restrictions.

lens_opacity.label: Lens mouse pointer opacity
lens_opacity.tooltip:
Default value 0.5

Where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque. In Tint and Blur modes, it will always be transparent

smooth_move.label: Smooth Move
smooth_move.tooltip:
Default value 3

Amount of smoothness/drift of the zoom image as it moves. The higher the number, the smoother/more drifty the movement will be. 1 = no smoothing.

show_title.label: Show Title
show_title.tooltip: Shows the title tag of the image.

title_opacity.label: Title Opacity
title_opacity.tooltip:
Default value 0.5

Specifies the opacity of the title if displayed, where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque.

padding.label: Padding
padding.tooltip:
in pixels

Default value 15

Space between FancyBox wrapper and content

margin.label: Margin
margin.tooltip:
in pixels

Default value 20

Space between viewport and FancyBox wrapper

title_show.label: Show Title
title_show.tooltip: Shows the title tag of the image.

title_position.label: Title Position
title_position.tooltip: The position of title. Can be set to 'outside', 'inside' or 'over'

overlay_opacity.label: Overlay Opacity
overlay_opacity.tooltip:
Default value 0.3

Where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque.

overlay_color.label: Color of the Overlay
overlay_color.tooltip: Specifies a overlay color. Colors should be specified in hex format, e.g. '#aa00aa'.

content_click.label: Clicks the content
content_click.tooltip: FancyBox will be closed when user clicks the content or will navigate to next gallery item.

show_effect.label: Effect
show_effect.tooltip: Animation effect. Can be set to 'elastic', 'fade' or 'none'

show_speed.label: The time it takes to complete transition
show_speed.tooltip:
in milliseconds

Default value 250

Speed of the fade and elastic transitions

mouse_wheel.label: Mouse wheel
mouse_wheel.tooltip: Navigate gallery using the mouse wheel.

auto_play.label: Slideshow
auto_play.tooltip: Slideshow will start after opening the first gallery item.

loop.label: Enable cyclic navigation
loop.tooltip: This means, if you click "next" after you reach the last element, first element will be displayed (and vice versa).

nav_effect.label: Effect
nav_effect.tooltip: Animation effect. Can be set to 'elastic', 'fade' or 'none'

nav_speed.label: The time it takes to complete transition
nav_speed.tooltip:
in milliseconds

Default value 250

Speed of the fade and elastic transitions
